title: Scientist claims he knows where missing MH370 went: 'Perfect hiding spot lies in...'
content: Australian scientists Vincent Lyne has claimed in LinkedIn that he knows where the missing MH370 is, he's found the perfect hiding place from the plane that went missing in 2014 with 239 people on board -- never to be found. His theory is that the plane was deliberately crashed into a a depth of 20,000 ft on the Indian Ocean's Broken Ridge. Filled with fine sediments, it is the perfect hiding place for the MH-370, the scientist said concluding that the pilot of the plane Ahmad Shah deliberately crashed it.
summary: Australian scientists Vincent Lyne has claimed in LinkedIn that he knows where the missing MH370 is, he's found the perfect hiding place from the plane that went missing in 2014 with 239 people on board -- never to be found. His theory is that the plane was deliberately crashed into a a depth of 20,000 ft on the Indian Ocean's Broken Ridge. Filled with fine sediments, it is the perfect hiding place for the MH-370, the scientist said concluding that the pilot of the plane Ahmad Shah deliberately crashed it.

title: Tulsi Gabbard officially endorses Donald Trump: 'He will walk us back from brink of war'
content: Tulsi Gabbard, former Democratic leader, Monday officially endorsed Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump in Detroit and said she is confident that Trump will take the country back from the brink of war. ​"We can't be prosperous unless we are at peace and we can't be free as long as we have a government that is retaliating against its political opponents and undermining our civil liberties weaponizing our very institutions against those they deem as threat. Kamala Harris has done this in the last three years. She won't hesitate to do this if she's elected," Tulsi said.
summary: Tulsi Gabbard, former Democratic leader, Monday officially endorsed Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump in Detroit and said she is confident that Trump will take the country back from the brink of war. ​"We can't be prosperous unless we are at peace and we can't be free as long as we have a government that is retaliating against its political opponents and undermining our civil liberties weaponizing our very institutions against those they deem as threat. Kamala Harris has done this in the last three years. She won't hesitate to do this if she's elected," Tulsi said.

title: Trump's X-treme comeback: A two-hour rant with capital letters and catchy insults
content: Former President Donald Trump resumed posting on X after a long hiatus, critiquing the Democratic Party and Vice President Kamala Harris. In six posts within two hours, Trump accused Harris of poor leadership and forecasted a dire future under her presidency, touching on foreign policy and economic issues. He urged supporters to vote for him in 2024.
summary: Former President Donald Trump resumed posting on X after a long hiatus, critiquing the Democratic Party and Vice President Kamala Harris. In six posts within two hours, Trump accused Harris of poor leadership and forecasted a dire future under her presidency, touching on foreign policy and economic issues. He urged supporters to vote for him in 2024.

title: Kamala Harris' old 'last person in the room' video viral on 3rd anniversary of Afghanistan war withdrawal
content: On the occasion of the third anniversary of the suicide bombing at the Hamid Karzai International Airport that killed 13 US service members as the US withdrew its troop from Afghanistan, an old video of Kamala Harris claiming that she was the last person in the room when Biden decided to pull US troops out of Afghanistan went viral. Amid the intense politicking ahead of the election, the GOP Monday asked where are Joe Biden and Kamala Harris while Donald Trump paid respects to the slain service members.
summary: On the occasion of the third anniversary of the suicide bombing at the Hamid Karzai International Airport that killed 13 US service members as the US withdrew its troop from Afghanistan, an old video of Kamala Harris claiming that she was the last person in the room when Biden decided to pull US troops out of Afghanistan went viral. Amid the intense politicking ahead of the election, the GOP Monday asked where are Joe Biden and Kamala Harris while Donald Trump paid respects to the slain service members.

title: Columnist Rich Lowry slammed for his 'how to go after Kamala Harris' suggestion in NYT
content: Rich wrote that presidential races are deeply personal and it involved disqualifying the opponent more than convincing voters that the opponent's platform is not right. He cited the example of how the Obama team hammered Mitt Romney calling him 'heartless' 'out-of-touch capitalist' and all policy debates basically went back to this.
summary: Rich wrote that presidential races are deeply personal and it involved disqualifying the opponent more than convincing voters that the opponent's platform is not right. He cited the example of how the Obama team hammered Mitt Romney calling him 'heartless' 'out-of-touch capitalist' and all policy debates basically went back to this.

title: France's Macron denies 'political' motive behind Telegram CEO Pavel Durov's arrest
content: French President Macron confirmed that Pavel Durov, founder of Telegram, was taken into custody in France during an ongoing judicial investigation. Durov, who was arrested at Le Bourget airport after arriving from Azerbaijan, faces allegations of non-cooperation in cyber and financial crime investigations. Macron emphasized there is no political motive behind the arrest.
summary: French President Macron confirmed that Pavel Durov, founder of Telegram, was taken into custody in France during an ongoing judicial investigation. Durov, who was arrested at Le Bourget airport after arriving from Azerbaijan, faces allegations of non-cooperation in cyber and financial crime investigations. Macron emphasized there is no political motive behind the arrest.

title: Ahead of debate, Donald Trump calls out bias in ABC news
content: Former President Donald Trump has raised concerns over participating in the September 10 debate with Vice President Kamala Harris, citing perceived bias at ABC News. Trump criticised a recent interview with Senator Tom Cotton and took aim at Democratic strategist Donna Brazile, questioning her impartiality. Despite initial objections, Trump agreed to the debate on ABC News.
summary: Former President Donald Trump has raised concerns over participating in the September 10 debate with Vice President Kamala Harris, citing perceived bias at ABC News. Trump criticised a recent interview with Senator Tom Cotton and took aim at Democratic strategist Donna Brazile, questioning her impartiality. Despite initial objections, Trump agreed to the debate on ABC News.

title: Trump had a 'covfefe' rerun. This time, it was 'powerfulnnz'
content: Powerfulnnz was not powerful enough to take the Internet by surprise because it witnessed covfefe when Trump wrote, "Despite the constant negative press covfefe". At that time, he took the confusion in his stride and wrote, "Who can figure out the true meaning of 'covfefe'? The White House, in fact, said the president and a small group of people knew exactly what covfefe meant.
summary: Powerfulnnz was not powerful enough to take the Internet by surprise because it witnessed covfefe when Trump wrote, "Despite the constant negative press covfefe". At that time, he took the confusion in his stride and wrote, "Who can figure out the true meaning of 'covfefe'? The White House, in fact, said the president and a small group of people knew exactly what covfefe meant.

title: Should Elon Musk be 'nervous' after Telegram CEO's arrest?
content: Pavel Durov, Telegram's founder, was detained by French authorities at Bourget airport, Paris, on August 24, 2024. The arrest is tied to an investigation into Telegram’s role in criminal activities due to inadequate content moderation. Durov's predicament has sparked debates on free speech and digital privacy, influencing global tech platform regulations.
summary: Pavel Durov, Telegram's founder, was detained by French authorities at Bourget airport, Paris, on August 24, 2024. The arrest is tied to an investigation into Telegram’s role in criminal activities due to inadequate content moderation. Durov's predicament has sparked debates on free speech and digital privacy, influencing global tech platform regulations.

title: Poland says drone likely entered airspace during strike on Ukraine
Amid Kennedy family drama, Billy Baldwin claims he knows why RFK Jr supports Trump: 'It's now or...'
content: Billi Baldwin said after missing the chances in 2006 and 2008, RFK Jr is now desperate to fulfil his presidential dreams and 2024 is a now or never year for him for which he sold his soul and went to bed with "Roger Stone, Mike Flynn, Steve Bannon... and ultimately Trump". Amid a major Kennedy family drama over RFK's decision to support Trump, Baldwin simplified it calling it his 'political cowardice'.
summary: Billi Baldwin said after missing the chances in 2006 and 2008, RFK Jr is now desperate to fulfil his presidential dreams and 2024 is a now or never year for him for which he sold his soul and went to bed with "Roger Stone, Mike Flynn, Steve Bannon... and ultimately Trump". Amid a major Kennedy family drama over RFK's decision to support Trump, Baldwin simplified it calling it his 'political cowardice'.

title: Watch: Ukraine's '9/11-like' drone attack on residential building in Russia's Saratov
content: Debris from a Ukrainian drone was intercepted by Russian defense systems, causing significant damage to residential buildings in Saratov and Engels. Two people were seriously injured. Emergency services responded swiftly to the areas affected. The attacks highlighted the ongoing conflict since Russia's full-scale invasion began in February 2022. Video footage of the attack is going viral on the internet.
summary: Debris from a Ukrainian drone was intercepted by Russian defense systems, causing significant damage to residential buildings in Saratov and Engels. Two people were seriously injured. Emergency services responded swiftly to the areas affected. The attacks highlighted the ongoing conflict since Russia's full-scale invasion began in February 2022. Video footage of the attack is going viral on the internet.

title: Seven injured in fire at Russia's Omsk oil refinery, production continues
content: A fire at Russia's Omsk oil refinery resulted in seven hospitalizations, with one person in serious condition. The refinery, operated by Gazprom Neft, maintained normal operations despite the incident. The blaze affected a major crude distillation unit, although production plans remain on track. The cause of the fire is still unknown, though recent attacks on refineries have raised concerns.
summary: A fire at Russia's Omsk oil refinery resulted in seven hospitalizations, with one person in serious condition. The refinery, operated by Gazprom Neft, maintained normal operations despite the incident. The blaze affected a major crude distillation unit, although production plans remain on track. The cause of the fire is still unknown, though recent attacks on refineries have raised concerns.

title: Furious neighbors want JD Vance to move out. What did he do?
content: After the assassination attempt on Donald Trump in Pennsylvania, Secret Service has tightened the security of Trump's running mate JD Vance resulting in a closure of a park at the area where JD stays with his family in Alexandria. Neighbors are at a loss to understand why the park was a security threat for the Ohio senator and that he should move out if he has a security threat in the area itself.
summary: After the assassination attempt on Donald Trump in Pennsylvania, Secret Service has tightened the security of Trump's running mate JD Vance resulting in a closure of a park at the area where JD stays with his family in Alexandria. Neighbors are at a loss to understand why the park was a security threat for the Ohio senator and that he should move out if he has a security threat in the area itself.

title: Trump aides panic as former president only plays golf: 'Has he lost his mojo?'
content: Reports earlier suggested that Donald Trump's aides apprehend that the former president is yet to overcome the trauma of the assassination attempt as he was found to be watching and rewatching the clip where the bullet grazed past his ear. Trump campaign insiders said he might be suffering from post traumatic stress disorder and hence doing what he enjoys the best -- golfing. Trump is actually taking baby steps as he held the first outdoor rally a few days ago in North Carolina -- first since the assassination attempt.
summary: Reports earlier suggested that Donald Trump's aides apprehend that the former president is yet to overcome the trauma of the assassination attempt as he was found to be watching and rewatching the clip where the bullet grazed past his ear. Trump campaign insiders said he might be suffering from post traumatic stress disorder and hence doing what he enjoys the best -- golfing. Trump is actually taking baby steps as he held the first outdoor rally a few days ago in North Carolina -- first since the assassination attempt.

title: Who is Juli Vavilova, mystery woman present with Telegram CEO Pavel Durov during his arrest?
content: When Telegram CEO Pavel Durov was arrested in France on Saturday evening, he was not alone. A 24-year-old woman, who identified herself as a crypto coach and a streamer from Dubai, was with him. Speculations are rife that Juli Vavilova, who could be Pavel's girlfriend, actually played a role in his arrest by strategically disclosing Pavel's location on her social media feed.
summary: When Telegram CEO Pavel Durov was arrested in France on Saturday evening, he was not alone. A 24-year-old woman, who identified herself as a crypto coach and a streamer from Dubai, was with him. Speculations are rife that Juli Vavilova, who could be Pavel's girlfriend, actually played a role in his arrest by strategically disclosing Pavel's location on her social media feed.

title: So this music legend is Prince Harry’s new ‘father-figure’: Reports
content: Prince Harry has reportedly formed a close bond with Canadian music producer David Foster, who has become a mentor and father figure to him. Foster and his wife, Katharine McPhee, helped Harry and Meghan Markle settle when they moved to Canada in 2020, and the friendship has continued since their relocation to California.
summary: Prince Harry has reportedly formed a close bond with Canadian music producer David Foster, who has become a mentor and father figure to him. Foster and his wife, Katharine McPhee, helped Harry and Meghan Markle settle when they moved to Canada in 2020, and the friendship has continued since their relocation to California.

title: Pavel Durov's controversial life: From 'Russian Zuckerberg' to 'father of 100+ kids', now arrested in France
content: Tech entrepreneur Pavel Durov, known for creating VKontakte and Telegram, was arrested in Paris over alleged criminal activities related to Telegram. His legal troubles include accusations of fraud, drug trafficking, and promoting terrorism. Durov's arrest and Telegram's controversial role in global conflicts, such as Russia's war against Ukraine, have raised significant concerns.
summary: Tech entrepreneur Pavel Durov, known for creating VKontakte and Telegram, was arrested in Paris over alleged criminal activities related to Telegram. His legal troubles include accusations of fraud, drug trafficking, and promoting terrorism. Durov's arrest and Telegram's controversial role in global conflicts, such as Russia's war against Ukraine, have raised significant concerns.

title: Trump’s Bedminster Golf Club to host January 6 awards Gala on Sept 5: High-stakes fundraiser for riot legal defense
content: Trump’s golf club in Bedminster will host a gala on September 5 to raise funds for individuals charged in the January 6 Capitol attack. Prominent invitees include Rudy Giuliani and former Trump advisor Peter Navarro. Trump is listed as an invited speaker but may not attend due to ongoing legal matters. The tickets for the event start at $1,500.
summary: Trump’s golf club in Bedminster will host a gala on September 5 to raise funds for individuals charged in the January 6 Capitol attack. Prominent invitees include Rudy Giuliani and former Trump advisor Peter Navarro. Trump is listed as an invited speaker but may not attend due to ongoing legal matters. The tickets for the event start at $1,500.

title: Vivek Ramaswamy’s full-circle moment with tennis legend Andre Agassi: ‘Longest distance is between your mind & heart’
content: Vivek Ramaswamy shared an inspiring experience on X, detailing a tennis session with legend Andre Agassi. Once a ball boy for Agassi, Vivek later played as his partner. He quoted Agassi's advice: "The longest distance between two points is that between your mind & your heart. Bend the former to meet the latter."
summary: Vivek Ramaswamy shared an inspiring experience on X, detailing a tennis session with legend Andre Agassi. Once a ball boy for Agassi, Vivek later played as his partner. He quoted Agassi's advice: "The longest distance between two points is that between your mind & your heart. Bend the former to meet the latter."
